issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Due to the changes in secure storage, specifically https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/0056de40007059a256db0da56438f5ff2b1cb049, the old python scripts no longer work for Ti.App.Properties.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run anvil for iOS
 a. In titanium_mobile/anvil/driver, run 'node driver.js --mode=local --platform=ios"
 b. In the CLI prompt, type 'start'

Expected Results:
All the tests should run

Actual Results:
Anvil fails with the error: data parameter is nil at init.js
(The line actually points to an problem with Ti.App.Properties)
fields.summary: Anvil: iOS tests in anvil fail to run
